body:
Do you want NBA Power Rankings from a professional sports betting model? Then you're in the right place. Far more accurate than any NBA journo or content marketing kid, these NBA Power Rankings are created by a market beating Model. You won't see it get carried away by a few good games or some lucky momentum. It's emotionless and objective. We'll update the NBA Power Rankings every week. - - - ## **NBA Power Rankings** ![NBA Power Rankings](/images/uploads/nba-power-rankings-march-2.png "NBA Power Rankings") What does the Rating mean? The Jazz at 7.55 means they are 7.55 points better than average. Cleveland -7.95 means 7.95 points worse than the average team. The number doesn't include home ground advantage either. So Jazz vs Cavs in Utah is going to create a monster line on our **[NBA Predictions Model](https://www.betrefinery.com/nba-betting/nba-predictions)**. - - - ## **NBA Power Rankings Commentary** Lakers and Nets take a little hit, while Utah are clearly the best team in the NBA. Denver and the Clippers are quietly making move on the top teams too. With the Bucks still getting the most respect in the East. Cleveland are absolutely horrendous and the worst team by some way. Brooklyn and Philly have made some movements upwards, and Dallas are the biggest faller. Toronot's position would shock many NBA fans but they're one to watch on our **[NBA Predictions Model](https://www.betrefinery.com/nba-betting/nba-predictions)**. - - - ### **Want more insight? Join the weekly email.** ### **We promise it's worth your time.** ### **
** - - - ## **More NBA Resources** We LOVE betting futures.
